biotools.summary: The SALAMI web server searches the protein data bank (PDB) for structures similar to input coordinates of a protein chain. Output is provided in a simple structure viewer with details of the sequence, structural similarity and sequence alignments.

bioschemas.name: SALAMI
bioschemas.summary: The SALAMI web server searches the protein data bank (PDB) for structures similar to input coordinates of a protein chain. Output is provided in a simple structure viewer with details of the sequence, structural similarity and sequence alignments.
